author: RTÉ News
title: Information on support for people cocooning
description: Many people aged over 70 are struggling to "cocoon" during the Covid-19 pandemic. Here's some information on what assistance is available to people staying at home.
content:
From midnight on 27 March until 12 April everybody must stay at home except in specific circumstances. 
In particular, people aged over 70 and people who are extremely medically vulnerable are to remain at home and not venture out at all but instead "cocoon"… [+4743 chars]
